Entries.jodiletter: Hello @! I was inspired to start gardening yesterday and I thought you might like some of these spare seeds!  ^   -Jodi %item object 595 10 %%[#]A Gift From Jodi
Entries.samsmusic: @!^Something hit a chord with me and I got a bout of musical inspiration! Anyway, I saw this and thought you might enjoy it!  ^   -Sam %item object 463 1 %%[#]A Gift From Sam
Entries.haleyshoot: @.^I was doing a photo shoot yesterday and had this lying around as a prop. I don't need it anymore though so I thought you would like it or something. Hey, maybe I can shoot some photos with you sometime!  ^   -Haley %item object 421 1 %%[#]A Gift From Haley
Entries.Lewisgold: @.^There has been a pest in my garden lately and it would appear that they seem content on publicly digging up the things they found. As Mayor, I cannot in good conscience keep this valuable item so I, as a generous and benevolent Mayor, thought you might appreciate it.  ^   -Mayor Lewis %item object 336 1 %%[#]A Gift From Mayor Lewis
Entries.harveynote: @.^I was looking for something behind the counter yesterday and I came across this. Seems like I ordered one too many bottles so I thought you'd benefit from this the most. Feel free to stop by the clinic if you ever need more! Remember to stay safe if you go into that mine!   ^   -Harvey %item object 351 1 %%[#]A Gift From Harvey
Entries.vincentsletter: @.^I asked Sam to help me write this but then he got busy so Mum helped! (hello @!) We all wanted to say thank you for being so nice to Biscuit! She can be like me sommt__ sometimes but you are still nice to her. I want you to have some of my favorite stuff because I app-- appree-- appreciate you for being nice. Kay thanks! P.S. Mum says kay isn't really the right word but I use it all the time so it has to be, right?   ^   -Vincent %item object 612 2 %%[#]A Gift From Vincent
Entries.leahfood: @.^I was wondering if you would be interested in trying this for me. I've been practicing my cooking with ingredients I foraged myself and I think they're turning out great. Even Biscuit likes my cooking! please enjoy,   ^   -Leah %item object 196 1 %%[#]A Gift From Leah
Entries.marlongift: greetings @.^ A visitor found an old blade and brought it to the guild. The quality was bad but the metal itself was good enough to be re-worked. I hope this aids you on your travels  ^   -Marlon %item object 533 1 %%[#]A Gift From Marlon
Entries.marubot: Hello @.^ You won't believe it but MarILDA was here for a visit yesterday! I did some repairs and we had a lovely chat. While I was doing some maintenance I found this and thought you would like it. MarILDA and I both wish you well!  ^   -Maru %item object 787 1 %%[#]A Gift From Maru
Entries.Emilyfashion: Hello @.^ Yesterday I had a really productive day and I came to a realization about about my hobby. This was laying around my work room afterwards and I thought you might enjoy it! It always brings me a sense of calmness when working to have one of these around.  ^   -Emily%item object 70 1 %%[#]A Gift From Emily
Entries.alexletter: Hey @!^ Granny made a whole bunch of cookies yesterday and I thought I would be generous and share! No need to thank me, I already know I'm awesome (but if you want to tell me I'm more awesome I won't complain).  ^   -Alex %item object 223 1 %%[#]A Gift From Alex
